articles.title: Vaccine Acceptance Continues to Rise
articles.description: The number of Canadians willing to be vaccinated is on the rise, and the number of people hesitant or refusing to take a Covid-19 vaccine is at a new low.
articles.content:
OTTAWA, ON, June 1, 2021 /CNW/ - The number of Canadians willing to be vaccinated is on the rise, and the number of people hesitant or refusing to take a Covid-19 vaccine is at a new low.

articles.author: Ashley MacLennan
articles.title: Closed Border Blues
articles.description: With the US/Canada border still closed to non-essential travel, many Canadian fans are left longing for the chance to see baseball in-person.
articles.content: Some of my fondest memories of baseball have nothing to do with the game being played on the field. Every summer like clockwork, my best friend and I set out on a new baseball adventure. We wait eage… [+9464 chars]

articles.author: Naotaka Yoshikawa, Hiroki Suganuma, Hideki Matsuoka, Yuki Tanaka, Pierre Hemme, Maximilien Cazayous, Yann Gallais, Masaki Nakano, Yoshihiro Iwasa, Ryo Shimano
articles.title: Ultrafast switching to an insulating-like metastable state by amplitudon excitation of a charge density wave
articles.description: Ultrafast optical excitation of a charge density wave leads to the formation of a metastable gapped state that synchronizes with the underlying correlated phase.
articles.content:
• 1.Grüner, G. The dynamics of charge-density waves. Rev. Mod. Phys.60, 11291181 (1988). ADS  Article  Google Scholar
